tool.name: CNVkit Sex
tool.description: Guess samples’ chromosomal sex from the relative coverage of chromosomes X and Y
tool.command: ln -s '$input_filename_file' ./sample.cnr && #if $input_filename_file ln -s '$input_filename_file' ./sample.cns && #end if cnvkit.py sex ./sample.cnr #if $input_filename_file ./sample.cns #end if --output gene-sex.txt $male_reference
tool.help:
Guess samples’ chromosomal sex from the relative coverage of chromosomes X and Y.
The output is a table of the sample name (derived from the filename), inferred sex (string “Female” or “Male”), and log2 ratio value of chromosomes X and Y.
